channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: RBC becomes third Wall Street firm to lower S&P 500 target
Stock-market bulls abandoned by Trump won’t be saved by Powell and the Fed
Trump says he will speak with Putin on Tuesday about ending war in Ukraine
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said he plans to speak to Russian President Vladimir Putin on Tuesday.

item.title: OECD forecasts U.S. growth to slow and Mexico to enter recession
Trump invokes 18th-century Aliens Enemies Act to speed deportations, judge stalls it hours later
item.description: A federal judge on Saturday barred the Trump administration from deportations under an 18th-century law that the president invoked just hours earlier.

item.title: Voice of America staff put on leave after Trump orders cuts
item.description: Employees at Voice of America were placed on paid leave, one day after Trump signed an executive order gutting the government-funded media outlets' pa...

item.title: Stock futures dip as Bessent dismisses market worries: ‘Corrections are healthy'
U.S. piles pressure on Yemen's Houthis with new airstrikes
item.description: The United States carried out new airstrikes on Yemen on Monday, the Houthis' Al Masirah TV said.

item.title: Apple now faces a problem far bigger than tariffs or weak iPhone sales
Trump launches large-scale strikes on Yemen's Houthis, at least 19 killed
item.description: At least 19 were killed as U.S. President Donald Trump launched large-scale military strikes against Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthis on Saturday.
